name: Dental Services
description: Potrero Hill Health Center offers the following dental services: Clinical services offered: - Oral examinations - Dental x-rays - Teeth cleaning (Prophylaxis) - Deep cleaning (Scaling and Root Planning) - Fluoride treatment - Dental Sealants - Fillings (Amalgam and Composite) - Routine teeth extractions - Children root canal (Pulpotomy) - Emergency treatment: incision and drainage for oral abscess
fullDescription: Potrero Hill Health Center offers the following dental services: Clinical services offered: - Oral examinations - Dental x-rays - Teeth cleaning (Prophylaxis) - Deep cleaning (Scaling and Root Planning) - Fluoride treatment - Dental Sealants - Fillings (Amalgam and Composite) - Routine teeth extractions - Children root canal (Pulpotomy) - Emergency treatment: incision and drainage for oral abscess
whatTheyOffer: Potrero Hill Health Center offers the following dental services: Clinical services offered: - Oral examinations - Dental x-rays - Teeth cleaning (Prophylaxis) - Deep cleaning (Scaling and Root Planning) - Fluoride treatment - Dental Sealants - Fillings (Amalgam and Composite) - Routine teeth extractions - Children root canal (Pulpotomy) - Emergency treatment: incision and drainage for oral abscess
howToGetIt: To receive medical services at the Potrero Hill Health Center you must be enrolled in the SF Health Networ patients. Learn how to enroll or see if you qualify for a health program if you don't have health coverage. Enroll in the health network.
cost: For SF Health Network (SFHN) and Healthy SF members: SFHN members with Medi-Cal — Basic dental services covered Healthy SF participants — Emergency dental care only provided based on sliding scale fee schedule For non-SFHN members: Children — Basic dental services covered Adults — Emergency dental care only with Medi-Cal or sliding scale fee schedule
